page.title: 06SCHOOL SURVEY 2
page.content: 4.Where does your{father work? } - Hardly any fathers work in Walkhampton,although some were farmers nearby.The majority worked around Plymouth and Tavistock. 5.Where do your parents do their {shopping?} - About half shop at local stores and the rest use nearby supermarket and superstores eg. ASDA and TESCO. The TESCO store at Lee Mill was more than 10 miles away. Nobody said their parents made much use of the local shops in the village. 6. How would you like to{improve} Walkhampton? -Most children wanted more leisure facilities eg 'leisure centre' or a better,covered swimming pool. One wanted 'a big toy shop' and two thought no improvement needed.
